What is WPC?

Wood Polymer Composite (WPC) is a hybrid material that combines the best properties of wood and plastic. It is composed of wood fibers/flour and thermoplastics. This unique composition makes it incredibly durable and resistant to the elements that typically damage natural wood.

For Chennai's humid climate, WPC is the superior choice. It does not absorb moisture, meaning it won't swell, warp, or rot during the monsoon season. Plus, it is completely impervious to termites and borers, saving you from costly pest control treatments.

Key Features

100% Waterproof

Can be washed directly with water. Ideal for bathrooms and kitchens.

Termite Proof

Lifetime guarantee against termite and borer attacks.

Fire Retardant

Self-extinguishing properties ensure safety for your home.

High Density

Superior screw holding capacity and structural strength.

Paintable

Can be painted, polished, or laminated just like natural wood.

Eco-Friendly

Made from recycled materials. No trees are cut for WPC.
